about_the_game:
Upgrade your journey and gear up for action with bonus tactical equipment, an expanded locker, and a basic lockbox.

ADDITIONAL TACTICAL EDITION EQUIPMENT AT START

Locker Size (10x35)

Secure Lockbox (2x2)

+ 5000$ (in-game)

  • 1x Assault Rifle

  • 2x Grenades

  • 3x Assault Rifle Magazines

  • 2x Foregrips

  • 1x Flashlight

  • 180x Assault Rifle Ammunition

  • 1x Helmet

  • 1x Ballistic Vest

  • 1x Tactical Rig

  • 1x Backpack

  • 1x Leather Wallet

  • 1x Headset

  • 1x Biocular Nightvision

  • 1x NVG Mount

  • 1x Combat Meal

  • 1x Water

  • 2x Bandages

  • 2x Tourniquets

STANDARD EDITION EQUIPMENT AT START

Locker Size (10x25)

Secure Lockbox (2x2)

10000$ (in-game)

Starting Gear

  • 1x Assault Rifle

  • 1x Pistol

  • 1x Knife

  • 1x Belt

  • 2x Pistol Magazines

  • 1x Backpack

  • 1x Water

  • 1x Combat Meal

  • 1x Bandage

  • 1x Tourniquet

  • 1x Surgery Kit

  • 1x Large Blood Bag

  • 1x Splint

  • 1x Painkillers

  • 1x Helmet

  • 1x Armor Plate Carrier

  • 3x Assault Rifle Magazines

Locker Contents

  • 2x Assault Rifles

  • 2x Pistols

  • 2x Stun Grenades

  • 6x Assault Rifle Magazines

  • 4x Pistol Magazines

  • 2x Collimators

  • 2x Flashlight Mounts

  • 2x Flashlights

  • 360x Assault Rifle Ammunition

  • 100x Pistol Rifle Ammunition

  • 2x Helmets

  • 2x Armor Plate Carriers

  • 2x Backpacks

  • 2x Belts

  • 2x Medkits

  • 2x Headsets

  • 2x Eyewear

  • 2x Hats

  • 2x Combat Meals

  • 2x Water

  • 2x Splints

  • 2x Surgery Kits

  • 4x Bandages

  • 2x Tourniquets

  • 2x Painkillers

  • 1x Large Blood Bag

  • 2x Small Blood Bags

The equipment will be added to your character after every game reset.

The specific types of equipment may change in future resets.

Editions are upgradable, letting users upgrade by paying only the difference.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages or not be appropriate for viewing at work: Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
